name: Nexus Tools
description: Nexus Tools is a full stack trading platform built to decode the blockchain. It makes on-chain data readable and actionable with real-time trend detection, smart wallet tracking, and live CT feeds. From whale watching to token screeners, Nexus Tools brings traders everything they need in one interface. Follow trending coins, track KOL activity, monitor launches, and get notified as key movements happen. Execute trades with confidence, directly from the platform. Nexus Tools brings precision and speed to the chaos of crypto markets, offering a complete ecosystem for informed trading.
